Such a story of leadership.  https://news.berkeley.edu/…/im-a-berkeleyan-jose-magana-on…/ Graduating Berkeley CalNerds scholar was uprooted from his life in El Salvador and forced to flee his country as an undocumented refugee news.berkeley.edu I’m a Berkeleyan: Jose Magana on having faith in your journey, despite the turmoil Graduating Berkeley CalNerds scholar was uprooted from his life in El Salvador and forced to flee his country as an undocumented refugee Graduating Berkeley CalNerds scholar was uprooted from his life in El Salvador and forced to flee his country as an undocumented refugee UC LEADS April 27  ·  UC LEADS alumna Jessica Lopez Lara is such a wonderful role model. Check out this IGTV from  UC Merced   https://www.instagram.com/tv/CN8j2dLD8ym/… Instagram Jessica Lopez Lara is a UC Merced alum who graduated in May 2020. She is currently pursuing her Ph.D. in chemistry at UC Santa Barbara. She is a University of California Leadership Excellence through Advanced Degrees (UC LEADS) scholar who conducted research with Professor Benjamin Stokes. ⁣
⁣
Jessica is passionate about representing women in science, technology, engineering, and math (STEM). She hosted a female empowerment conference at UC Merced to motivate college students as well as K-12 girls to pursue STEM.⁣
⁣
